titleStmt.title: A prognostication for the yere of Christ Jesus our Lord & Sauiour, 1566 wherein are declared dyuers notable thinges, as you shal perceaue by the readyng therof : whiche (if God so permit) ar like to come to passe ... / set forth by John Securis ...
titleStmt.author: Securis, John.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
